front.title: Method for suggestion Alternative Servers to Enhance Connection Level Performance

abstract.t: This memo presents a method for allowing an HTTP server to provide hints in its HTTP responses to a user-agent that indicate the user could be better off connecting to a different IP than what they are currently connected to. This is highly relevant in a multi-homed server world where DNS may not have all of the relevant state necessary to make a proper routing decision. Additionally it is done in a manner that does not require application level changes as could be the case for an application level redirect such as a 3xx response
